job.description:
Task_ID: 87
under the login's Properties -> User Mappings:
1) on top, check "master". Should auto-enter client's login name in the "User" field 2a) on top, check "crd_control_db". Should auto-enter client's login name in the "User" field 2b) with "crd_control_db" still selected on top, on bottom select "crd_control_mgr"
save changes
<end of comment>
job.name: ModifySADNLoginUserMappings

command.script:
write-host "Configuring SADN Login's User Mappings"
Invoke-Sqlcmd -ServerInstance $env:COMPUTERNAME -Query " USE [crd_control_db] GO If not Exists (SELECT * FROM sys.database_principals where name = '@option.SADN_USERNAME@') BEGIN CREATE USER [@option.SADN_USERNAME@] FOR LOGIN [@option.SADN_USERNAME@] END
PRINT N'client login has been mapped to crd_control_db database'
USE [crd_control_db] GO ALTER ROLE [crd_control_mgr] ADD MEMBER [@option.SADN_USERNAME@] GO
PRINT N'Add MEMBER @option.SADN_USERNAME@ to ROLE crd_control_mgr'
USE [master] If not Exists (SELECT * FROM sys.database_principals where name = '@option.SADN_USERNAME@') BEGIN CREATE USER [@option.SADN_USERNAME@] FOR LOGIN [@option.SADN_USERNAME@] END
PRINT N'client login has been mapped to master database'
" -verbose
